metadata.title: CVE-2018-19213 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description: Netwide Assembler (NASM) through 2.14rc16 has memory leaks that may lead to DoS, related to nasm_malloc in nasmlib/malloc.c.

criterions.comment: nasm package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-04-25').
